titles.title: A resolution in support of Canadian-American Comprehensive Trade Negotiations.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the representatives of the United States should proceed on an expedited and priority basis to conclude the negotiation of a mutually beneficial comprehensive bilateral trade agreement between the United States and Canada.
